data.title: Inside Mar-a-Lago, Donald Trump’s Palm Beach resort
data.meta_description: My wife and I attended Thanksgiving dinner in November at the Donald J Trump ballroom in Mar-a-Lago at the nearest table to the president. data.text:
My wife and I attended Thanksgiving dinner in November at the Donald J Trump ballroom in Mar-a-Lago at the nearest table to the president. There were no other journalists in the room and, as an author researching Mar-a-Lago: Inside the Gates of Power at Donald Trump’s Presidential Palace, it was a unique opportunity to watch Trump up close, not 15ft away, for three hours.

Although I am not a member of Mar-a-Lago, I have many friends who are. They have invited me since the club opened in 1995. I’ve had many lunches and dinners and several times each winter played tennis on the red clay courts. I’ve chatted with Trump on occasion, although he has a strange attitude towards me.
